title: Shopee Onsite Campaign Report
description: A JSON object representing a Shopee onsite campaign report for a specific product ad.

merchantID.description: A unique merchant code for GRAAS clients

siteNickNameId.description: A unique merchant's store code for GRAAS clients

Sequence.description: The sequence or order of this report entry.

Product_Name_Ad_Name.description: The name and details of the advertised product.

Status.description: The current status of the campaign, such as 'Ongoing' or 'Completed'.

Ads_Type.description: The type of ads used in the campaign, e.g., 'Discovery Ads'.

Placement_Keyword.description: The selected placement and keyword targeting for the campaign, e.g., 'All'.

Start_Date.description: The start date and time of the campaign.

End_Date.description: The end date of the campaign. If 'Unlimited,' the campaign has no end date.

Impression.description: The number of times the ad has been displayed to potential customers.

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad.

CTR.description: The Click-Through Rate, expressed as a percentage.

Conversions.description: The total number of desired actions taken due to the campaign, e.g., purchases.

Direct_Conversions.description: The number of conversions that directly resulted from the campaign.

Conversion_Rate.description: The conversion rate, expressed as a percentage, for all conversions.

Direct_Conversion_Rate.description: The conversion rate, expressed as a percentage, for direct conversions.

Cost_per_Conversion.description: The cost per conversion with currency information.

Cost_per_Direct_Conversion.description: The cost per direct conversion with currency information.

Items_Sold.description: The total number of items sold as a result of the campaign.

Direct_Items_Sold.description: The number of items directly sold due to the campaign.

GMV.description: Gross Merchandise Value with currency information.

Direct_GMV.description: Gross Merchandise Value for direct sales with currency information.

Expense.description: The total campaign expenses with currency information.

ROAS.description: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS), expressed as a ratio, for the entire campaign.

Direct_ROAS.description: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS), expressed as a ratio, for direct conversions.

ACOS.description: Advertising Cost of Sales (ACOS), expressed as a percentage, for the entire campaign.

Direct_ACOS.description: Advertising Cost of Sales (ACOS), expressed as a percentage, for direct conversions.

Product_Impressions.description: The number of impressions specific to the advertised product.

Product_Clicks.description: The total clicks related to the advertised product.

Product_CTR.description: The Click-Through Rate (CTR), expressed as a percentage, for the advertised product.

Date.description: The date on which this report was generated.
